name: Hilton Copenhagen Airport

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I don’t understand why this is rated the best hotel in Copenhagen. In itself it is not bad but the finer details you would expect from a top hotel are missing. The room we had (1213) on one of the executive floors was OK but the carpet, chair and footstool were all stained. The quilt cover was threadbare and a magnifying mirror in the bathroom was lacking the glass part. Several calls were needed to get a response from housekeeping who changed the quilt but claimed the stains were candle wax and could not be removed. The mirror was ignored. We were offered a new room but the first room should never have been allowed to get into that state. The bathroom was ok but nothing special.
reviews.title: Not The Best??

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled solo
reviews.text: In the main reception the table tops were all badly stained (glasses and bottles). We never had occasion to use the restaurant.
reviews.title: Superb hotel and perfect for a short break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On checking in we were quoted a rate to upgrade to an executive room (400DKK), noticed a different rate in the room literature (550DKK)and were charged yet another rate on check out (450DKK). However I would suggest that the room upgrade is worth it if you are on a non breakfast tariff as a complimentary breakfast is served in the executive lounge. Then there is the added bonus of some snacks during the day, a complimentary bar and internet access. However this is the first hotel I have stayed at that charges to use the pool.
reviews.title: Almost perfect

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: The noise from the nearby airport cannot be heard but the noise from the bathroom ventilation was quite loud for light sleepers. I asked reception how to turn it off and they said to shut the bathroom door, turn out the lights and wait five minutes. This did not work and the noise went on.
reviews.title: excellent stay, recommend to everyone, couple things to be aware of

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Travel between the hotel and the airport is a short walk through a covered walkway. Travel to the city centre is just a short walk to the metro and a 15 minute journey on metro-trains that run very frequently. The metro is very easy to use with clear signs of next stop etc. It was also clean and hassle free. The hotel is also connected by bus and train.
reviews.title: Superb place to stay in Copenhagen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed twice in the Hilton at the airport and I would highly recommend it. It is cheaper than most hotels in Copenhagen (if you take the early booking but non-refundable rate which includes breakfast) and the super efficient metro (which runs 24 hours) takes you straight into the centre after a short ride.
reviews.title: Brilliant hotel - not far from the city centre

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is soundproof (unlike a number of Copenhagen hotels), the staff is friendly, the breakfast is great, the place is clean and the rooms are well appointed.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We have had a bad experience with another hotel in Copenhagen and our next stay in the city will definitely be in the Hilton.
reviews.title: Although not in the city center, we still liked it.....very much!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled on business
reviews.text: Beautiful Scandinavian design throughout.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Very comfortable room.
reviews.title: Perfect Place to Stay in Copenhage

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled with family
reviews.text: I always stay at the Hilton Copenhagen Airport when I arrive and when I leave Denmark. I treat myself to a small luxury before I go to another, less expensive hotel. But this real reason I stay is because you can walk right across the street from the airport to the hotel. I do not have to take a taxi or train or bother my relatives until the next day after I am rested. In addition, the Metro, bus, or train is right next to the hotel.
reviews.title: When I arrive and leave

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the hotel for three nights before flying on to Greenland for a Cruise. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful and our room was ready even though it was only just after 1.00pm. The room was very large clean and well equipped Bang & Oulfsen TV, tea and coffee all in good supply, and the bathrom was one of the largest we have had in a Hotel with seperate shower and bath all very clean and modern. The buffet style breakfast was very tasty and filling which was all good for a day sightseeing in Copenhagen.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The tram and railway station were next to the hotel giving easy access to the city (fifteen minutes to the centre of Copenhagen) and the trains ran regularly and through the night Ok even if you are a late night person.
reviews.title: Great Hotel with a fantastic location .

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a lovely relaxed stay at this hotel and would recommend it to all our friends and people who want a quiet, good quality hotel that is handy for the Airport and the City.
reviews.title: Wonderful Experience at the Hilton

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I have stayed 4 times at the Hilton in Copenhagen , usually the night before i leave for a vacation if i have to catch an early flight , as the hotel is perfectly situated right at the airport.
reviews.title: Fantastic Airport Hotel - A Big step above!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: Stayed at the Hilton Copenhagen Airport when we had an early morning flight. The hotel is fantastic - super comfortable, delicious food in the restaurant, cool bar to hang out and get a drink, and the hotel is directly linked to the airport by a walkway. It is the perfect place to stay if you need to be right at the CPH airport. I actually wished I had more time to stay there just to relax in the hotel! The hotel has a fitness room and a spa as well. Would definitely stay here again!
reviews.title: Awesome Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Copenhagen Airport on 2 occasions, based on the strength of the Tripadvisor comments and we weren't disappointed.
reviews.title: Very functional and comfortable airport hotel with fast access to town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel is easily accessible from the airport terminal and is a modern hotel with every amentity you would expect from a 5 star hotel. The service was friendly and attentitive. The rooms aren't the largest I have stayed in, but European hotel rooms tend to be a little smaller. The size of the room didn't impact the enjoyment of our stay. We left luggage in storage for several days whilst we travelled - that was a plus.
reviews.title: Best We've Had in Copenhagen

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The new metro is adjacent to the hotel - trains every 4 minutes to downtown Copenhagen, a 15 minute trip. We bought a book of 10 ten tickets and went back and forth with ease. Not the cheapest, but fast, efficient and clean. Yes, you missed the atmosphere of staying downtown but we still were able to experience Copenhagen, be that touring or enjoying a meal at all hours of the day and night. The convenience of easy access to the airport, particularly given an early morning flight and the ability to catch the metro to the city was a plus.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel, excellent staff, not ideal for city touring...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled with family
reviews.text: We were very pleased with the choice.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

description: Winner of the ‘Best Business Hotel in Denmark 2013’ by Business Destinations for the fifth consecutive year, the Hilton Copenhagen Airport Hotel is located next to Copenhagen Airport, a two-minute walk from Terminal 3 arrival hall via a covered walkway. This modern Copenhagen hotel, renowned for impeccable service and awarded the Green Key Certificate for Environmental Awareness, is 12 minutes from the city center by train and Metro services. Visit attractions such as Tivoli Gardens, Nyhavn, the Little Mermaid statue, and the National Aquarium - The Blue Planet - located walking distance from the hotel. The hotel is also easily accessible to Copenhagen Cruise Port, just 25 minutes away, and the Congress Centre, ten minutes away.
